nodes.text: The ro-roo was a small, herbivorous primate that was native to the wroshyr tree forests of Kashyyyk. Ro-roo paws were often used as good luck amulets. They were related in some respect to the similar looking purboles of Dathomir.

Ro-roos were included as creatures in the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided with the release of the 2005 expansion pack Rage of the Wookiees, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
Ro-roos are also mentioned in a deleted scene from the 2018 canon film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees (First appearance)
